resources.string: Nooi uit om deel te wees van die studie
Nooi asseblief net mense uit wat jy ken of wat aktief wil deelneem aan die studie.
Die hoofstuk is te kort om geanaliseer te word.
Slegs die studie bydraers kan versoek om \'n rekenaar analise te doen.
Kry \'n vol-bediener rekenaar analise van die hooflyn.
Maak seker dat die hoofstuk volledig is. Jy kan slegs eenkeer \'n analise versoek.
Alle SYNC lede bly op dieselfde posisie
Deel veranderinge met toeskouers en stoor dit op die bediener
U kan dit in die forum plak om in te bed
Bed in u webwerf of blog
Slegs openbare studies kan ingebed word!
Studie kon nie gevind word nie
Vee die hoofstuk uit? Jy gaan dit nie kan terugvat nie!
Vee al die kommentaar, karakters en getekende vorms in die hoofstuk uit?
Laai \'n wedstryd op deur die URL

plurals.name: pasteYourPgnTextHereUpToNbGames
plurals.comment: It is possible to create multiple chapters in one go. Please try to convey this using a short translation.
plurals.item: Plak jou PGN teks hier, tot by %s spel
Plak jou PGN teks hier, tot by %s spelle

resources.string: Ja: hou almal op dieselfde posisie
Nee: laat mense toe om vrylik deur te gaan
Vee die gesprek uit? Onthou, jy kan dit nie terug kry nie!

string.name: confirmDeleteStudy
string.comment: %s is replaced with the name of the study

resources.string: Skrap die hele studie? Daar is geen terugkeer nie! Tik die naam van die studie om te bevesting: %s

string.name: onlyMove
string.comment: onlyMove The only possible move. This is a label that can be placed in a study of a past game. It may not technically be the only move, but the only feasible one.

string.name: zugzwang
string.comment:
zugzwang What zugzwang is: https://lichess.org/practice/intermediate-tactics/zugzwang/9cKgYrHb/ybYJ9gNa
This specific string is a label that can be applied to a position in a study, to indicate one side is in zugzwang.

string.name: unclearPosition
string.comment: unclearPosition It is unclear who is winning or losing.

string.name: novelty
string.comment:
novelty
A move in the opening that has not been played before. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glossary_of_chess#theoretical_novelty

string.name: development
string.comment: development Used in studies - shows that the player made a developing move (e.g. pushing pawns to open their bishops in the opening).

string.name: attack
string.comment: attack A label that can be applied to a position in a Lichess study. Noun.

string.name: counterplay
string.comment:
counterplay A label that can be applied to a position in a Lichess study. Noun.
Generally describes a defending player who is under attack, and makes an attacking move elsewhere.

string.name: timeTrouble
string.comment: timeTrouble A label that can be applied to a position in a Lichess study. Noun. Indicates that a player had little time to think and make this move (clock was running low).

string.name: withCompensation
string.comment:
withCompensation
Compensation is the short-term positional advantage a player has in exchange for typically material disadvantage. Short term advantages involve initiative and attack. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Compensation_(chess)

string.name: withTheIdea
string.comment:
withTheIdea A label that can be applied to a position in a Lichess study. Noun.
Shows that the player was following the theory around an opening, even after the initial opening moves.

resources.string: Wat sal jy in hierdie posisie speel?
Geluk! Jy het hierdie les voltooi.

Hierdie is \'n gedeelde analisebord.

Gebruik dit om mee te analiseer en spelle te annoteer,
posisies met vriende te deel,
en natuurlik vir skaaklesse!

Dit is \'n kragtige hulpmiddel; spandeer \'n bietjie tyd om te sien hoe dit werk.

string.name: sharedAndSaveTitle
string.comment: As in: shared with other members and saved to database

resources.string:
Ander lede kan jou skuiwe intyds sien!
Alles is boonop vir altyd gestoor.

string.name: studyMembersText
string.comment: %1$s and %2$s are icons that will added at runtime

resources.string:
%1$s Toeskouers kan die studie sien en praat in die chat.

%2$s Bydraers kan skuiwe maak en die studie opdateer.

string.name: addMembersText
string.comment: %s is an icon that will added at runtime

resources.string:
Klik die %s-knoppie.
Besluit dan wie kan bydra en wie nie.

\'n Studie kan verskeie hoofstukke bevat.
Elke hoofstuk het \'n spesifieke beginposisie en skuiwe-boom.

string.name: commentPositionText
string.comment: %s is an icon that will added at runtime

resources.string:
Klik die %s-knoppie, of regs-klik op die skuiflys aan die regterkant.
Kommentaar word gedeel en gestoor.

Klik die !?-knoppie, of regs-klik op die skuiflys aan die regterkant.
Annoteringsimbole word gedeel en gestoor.

\'n Studie kan verskeie hoofstukke hê.
Elke hoofstuk het \'n spesifieke skuifboom,
en kan op verskillende maniere geskep word.

Slegs \'n bordopstelling vir \'n nuwe spel.
Geskik om openinge te ondersoek.

Stel die bord op soos jy dit wil hê.
Geskik vir eindspelle.
